message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at the special price of $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, thanks for your interest and counter-offer.  I appreciate your perspective on the value.  While I can't go as low as $9,500, I could consider $11,000.  This offer stands for the next 24 hours.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am unable to meet the price of $11,000. Would it be possible for you to lower the price to $10,000?
